channel.title: Automation on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Automaly

item.title: All about Odata actions in Dynamics 365 Finance And Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to creating and using OData actions in D365 Finance Operations data entities including Power Automate integration and automation scenarios.

item.title: Deploy SSRS reports in Dynamics 365 Finance, SCM using Powershell
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Deploy SSRS reports to Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations environments using PowerShell scripts. Automate report deployment for all reports or specific reports with DeployAllReportsToSSRS script.

item.title: How To d365fo.tools
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Master d365fo.tools PowerShell module for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations automation. Comprehensive guide covering installation, environment management, database operations, and SSRS deployment.

item.title: Create Purchase Orders - Confirm - Product receipt - Post using X++ in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete X++ code example for automating purchase order lifecycle in D365 Finance Operations including creation, confirmation, receipt, and posting processes.

item.title: Dynamics 365 for finance and operations database synchronization using command line
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to perform database synchronization in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations using command line tools and d365fo.tools. Includes examples for both cloud-hosted and on-premises environments.

item.title: How to block vendor and send email for notification
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Automated X++ solution to block vendors based on transaction conditions and send email notifications using batch jobs in Dynamics AX 2012.
